author: Jeremy Herb and Phil Mattingly, CNN
title: How significant are the US sanctions on Russia?
description: US President Joe Biden unleashed sweeping sanctions Thursday responding to Russian President Vladimir Putin's attack on Ukraine that target Moscow's banking, technology and aerospace sectors, though the US and Europe stopped short of several key steps to targ…
